Klasse DescriptorPool

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.DescriptorPool
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
AutoCloseable, VulkanFreeable, VulkanObject
public class DescriptorPool extends Object implements VulkanFreeable, VulkanObject
A Descriptor Pool holds some amount of Descriptors.
